h2_title: Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai
h3_title: Old Ginseng Guai Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Many times, he'll end his flailing by spinning around and then falling backward right on top of you. He'll have his own version of Rock Solid when he does this and flash yellow, so it's better to just evade him entirely.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Ginseng_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Old Ginseng Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai' and the sub-subsection 'Old Ginseng Guai Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Many times, he'll end his flailing by spinning around and then falling backward right on top of you. He'll have his own version of Rock Solid when he does this and flash yellow, so it's better to just evade him entirely.
